item.title: EA’s $55 Billion Deal Spurs a Shake-Up in the Gaming Sector
item.description: With EA likely going private in a $55-billion deal, opportunities may arise for other gaming companies. Here are some considerations for investors.

item.title: AMD Could Double From Here—Thanks to Its Blockbuster OpenAI Deal
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices is on track to double in share price, reaching the $400 level in mid-2026 as expectations for MI450 sales intensify.

item.title: The Juice Is Loose: Why Plug Power's Rally Is Just the Beginning
